metadata.name: access-request-device
metadata.ifmap:message: Clients MUST publish this singleValue metadata only between: access-request and device

metadata.name: access-request-ip
metadata.ifmap:message: Clients MUST publish this singleValue metadata only between: access-request and ip-address

metadata.name: access-request-mac
metadata.ifmap:message: Clients MUST publish this singleValue metadata only between: access-request and mac-address

metadata.name: authenticated-as
metadata.ifmap:message: Clients MUST publish this singleValue metadata only between: access-request and non-extended identity

metadata.name: authenticated-by
metadata.ifmap:message: Clients MUST publish this singleValue metadata only between: access-request and device

metadata.name: capability
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this multiValue metadata for: access-request

metadata.name: device-attribute
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this multiValue metadata for: access-request and device

metadata.name: device-characteristic
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this multiValue metadata for: access-request and device, ip-address and device, or mac-address and device

metadata.name: device-ip
metadata.ifmap:message: Clients MUST publish this singleValue metadata only between: device and ip-address

metadata.name: discovered-by
metadata.ifmap:message: Clients MUST publish this singleValue metadata only between: ip-address and device or mac-address and device

metadata.name: enforcement-report
metadata.ifmap:message: Clients MUST publish this multiValue metadata only between: ip-address and device or mac-address and device

metadata.name: event
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this multiValue metadata for: access-request, identity, ip-address or mac-address

metadata.name: ip-mac
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this multiValue metadata for: ip-address and mac-address

metadata.name: layer2-information
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this multiValue metadata for: access-request and device

metadata.name: location
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this multiValue metadata for: identity, ip-address or mac-address

metadata.name: request-for-investigation
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this multiValue metadata for: device and mac-address or device and ip-address

metadata.name: role
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this multiValue metadata for: access-request and identity

metadata.name: unexpected-behavior
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this multiValue metadata for: access-request, identity, ip-address or mac-address

metadata.name: wlan-information
metadata.ifmap:message: Recommended publish this singleValue metadata for: access-request and device
